heading: HR00730
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC ACCOUNTS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE EXAMINATION OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11223, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE UNIVERSAL HEALTH CARE ACT, ON SOME PROVISIONS DEEMED RESTRICTIVE AND DETRIMENTAL TO HEALTH CARE AVAILABILITY AND ACCESSIBILITY, WITH AN END GOAL OF INSTITUTING NECESSARY LEGISLATIVE INTERVENTION ON THE REALIZATION OF MORE ACCESSIBLE HEALTH CARE FOR ALL FILIPINOS
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-03-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00730
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC ACCOUNTS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE EXAMINATION OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11223, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE UNIVERSAL HEALTH CARE ACT, ON SOME PROVISIONS DEEMED RESTRICTIVE AND DETRIMENTAL TO HEALTH CARE AVAILABILITY AND ACCESSIBILITY, WITH AN END GOAL OF INSTITUTING NECESSARY LEGISLATIVE INTERVENTION ON THE REALIZATION OF MORE ACCESSIBLE HEALTH CARE FOR ALL FILIPINOS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GARIN, JANETTE L.
DATE FILED : 2020-02-24
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2020-03-02
